data.name: The Augury House
data.detailed_description:
The Augury House is a living house filled with strange secrets and dream-like spaces. Take your time in exploring the many spaces of The Augury House, which shift every other week!

Manuals are your Guide!

Please read our Manual for controls, hints, and basic information about this project. The Manual will expand as new things are added to the house!


For a compilation of all of the secrets of The Augury House, please read our Quick Reference Guide (aka DevHandbook)!

Mystery of the Frog

Let your ears guide you towards the frogs that live within the house's walls. If you are patient enough, they might let you into their deep and dark cave.

Features

- HUD-less design

- Hidden spaces
- Spatial audio
- Virtual Exhibitions

data.short_description: The Augury House is a shifting collection of short experiences and exhibitions. Contents change weekly.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
